reviewText: Great film & highly recommended - But import DVD for sale on Amazon is WILDLY overpriced - Exact same disc is available on Amazon.de (Germany) for a small fraction of what these bandits want - Many of the PAL discs on Amazon are like this - Try Amazon France, United Kingdom, Germany and Japan for an eyeopening experience. (2012 update) Still available from Amazon.fr (France) - Though Amazon prices (for now) are comparable.
